sentence.Network_en: Less cryptically, he said the arms race was still on.
sentence.Network_cn: 他又说,军备竞赛仍然在继续.

sentence.Network_en: The amending of A - Key must be processed cryptically in OTA authentication.
sentence.Network_cn: 在OTA鉴权中,A-Key的修改必须以保密的方式进行.

entry.tran: 有隐含意义的;含义隐晦的
entry.def: A cryptic remark or message contains a hidden meaning or is difficult to understand.

example.ex: He has issued a short, cryptic statement denying the spying charges...
example.tran: 他发表了一个简短隐晦的声明，否认对其间谍行为的指控。

example.ex: My father's notes are more cryptic here.
example.tran: 父亲的这段笔记更加晦涩难懂。

sentences.sentence: "we will meet again," he said cryptically

auth_sentence.content: "You are quiet until you say something," she replies cryptically.
auth_sentence.res_content: "You are quiet until you say something," she replies cryptically.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "You are quiet until you say something," she replies cryptically.

auth_sentence.content: Who knows, she observed cryptically, we could end up dealing with another general.
auth_sentence.res_content: Who knows, she observed cryptically, we could end up dealing with another general.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Who knows, she observed cryptically, we could end up dealing with another general.

auth_sentence.content: Hours later, he began to babble to one of the Special Purpose Team members, who responded only by humming cryptically.
